name: Red Velvet White Chocolate Cake Mix Cookies Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: red velvet cake mix, white chocolate chips, oil, egg
recipeInstructionSteps: Combine cake mix, chocolate chips, oil, and eggs in a mixing bowl.
Using an ice cream scoop or your hand, form golf ball-sized balls of cookie dough and transfer to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
